backend/main.mo: Actor adds characterId to user profiles and progress, enforcing access control for reading and saving both.
backend/migration.mo: Migration maps old profiles and progress to new types by adding a default characterId field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing character, selection, persistence, and UI integration features with associated frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and changes of major frontend files including character and progress handling.
frontend/index.css: Defines root OKLCH color variables and dark‑mode overrides with Tailwind base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing auth, profile setup, character selection, and game start/load logic.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing and loading states.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Modal collecting fighter name and character choice and saving both to the backend profile.
frontend/src/components/CharacterSelectM: Modal for choosing a playable character, showing portraits, bios, and confirming selection.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Wrapper layout that renders children over an optional blurred background image.
frontend/src/components/Hud.tsx: HUD displaying character portrait, chapter info, and current stat values from game state.
frontend/src/components/SaveLoadPanel.ts: Panel enabling authenticated users to save or load game progress via backend, handling encoding and decoding of character data.
frontend/src/game/challenges/BrawlChalle: Real-time combat mini‑game with attacks, blocks, combos, and dynamic health tracking that returns a scored result.
frontend/src/game/challenges/FocusChalle: Timed clicking challenge where the player clicks rapidly for 10 seconds to earn rewards based on count.
frontend/src/game/challenges/TacticsChal: Risk‑reward strategy choice challenge that resolves success via random roll and returns stat rewards.
frontend/src/game/challenges/types.ts: Type definitions for challenge result objects and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/game/challenges/WisdomChall: Multiple‑choice moral reasoning challenge evaluating wise responses and granting wisdom‑based rewards.
frontend/src/game/characters/characterPe: Utility functions encoding and decoding character IDs between UI strings and backend bigint indices.
Defines character interface, a list of three fighters, and helpers to fetch characters by ID with a default fallback.
frontend/src/game/state/gameState.ts: Defines game state structure and functions to create, load, and advance game progress, including chapter objectives handling.
frontend/src/game/state/reducer.ts: Implements a reducer handling choices, challenges, narrative progression, and story-read state updates.
frontend/src/game/story/chapters.ts: Provides chapter definitions with narratives, choices, and challenge types for the story-driven game.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login flow, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for loading and saving user profiles and progress via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles with custom gritty theme variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/screens/ChapterScreen.tsx: Renders the chapter gameplay screen, handling narrative progression, choices, challenges, and chapter advancement while syncing local reducer state to the parent.
frontend/src/screens/StartScreen.tsx: Displays the game's start menu with character selection, authentication UI, and options to start or load a game.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-persisted parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings including fonts, colors, animations, and container behavior with custom extensions for the game's UI style.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current specification, features, known issues, and requirements for building the Ramayan-inspired game.
